    • Constructor Detail

      • DataDecEncHandler

        public DataDecEncHandler()

      • DataDecEncHandler

        public DataDecEncHandler​(NTRU myNTRU)
        Konstruktor for Dec and Enc Handler of a Dataset. NTRU is used to Encript and Decript data, Key could be generated and also set as int array. Map sensorIdMap holds Target OOID and Sensorname, will be used to integrate into Decription and Encription of sensordata. Params have to be set: NTRU and MAP Object
        Parameters:
        myNTRU - NTRU mit Schlüsseln
        sensorIdMap - Map with Target Sensor Observed Object id and Sensorname

    • Method Detail

      • computeAndSendData

        public void computeAndSendData​(de.fhbielefeld.scl.database.model.jpa.TblExchangeConfiguration curExchange,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> valueMap,
                               java.lang.String targetHostUriWs)
                        throws com.sun.xml.ws.developer.ServerSideException,
                               java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                               javax.ws.rs.NotSupportedException,
                               java.lang.Exception
        Die Methode verarbeitet einen Datensatz vom jeweiligen Sensor mittels NTRU und sendet diese an den Target Webservice.
        Parameters:
        sensorName - Name des Sensors für die Zuordnung beim Verschlüsseln
        valueMap - Map of Database values
        zielSensorObservedObjectId - Die OOID vom Target Server
        sensorname - Eindeutiger des Sensors Aufbau: "sensorname_mac)
        targetHostUriWs - Webservice uri
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        com.sun.xml.ws.developer.ServerSideException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        javax.ws.rs.NotSupportedException
